channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why investing in women’s health is good for business
item.description: Dr. Anita Zaidi is president of the Gender Equality Division at the Gates Foundation.

item.title: What to know about Erika McEntarfer, the BLS commissioner fired by Trump
item.description: She joins a growing list of people fired by Trump since January.

item.title: Lower gas prices could follow from OPEC+ boosting production by 547,000 barrels per day

item.title: For the first time ever, all major casinos on the Las Vegas strip are unionized
item.description: “It’s always been our goal to make sure that this town is a union town," said Ted Pappageorge, lead negotiator of the Culinary Workers Union.

item.title: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei says his employees are refusing Zuckerberg’s $100 million payout—and he’s not even matching salaries to keep them
